intro.name: Bhavesh Songara
intro.introPara: A front-end developer and pursuing graduation. I'm passionate about writing code and exploring new technologies to solve real world problems. Currently I am looking for a full-time opportunity as frond-end developer.

paras: Hi, I am Bhavesh Songara, a JavaScript developer with a firm knowledge of React, React Native, Redux, and NextJS.

I have good a knowledge of frameworks and tools such as Webpack, npm, and Yarn and have experience working with RESTful APIs. I have good grasp of software architectural, low-level and high-level design.
I'm passionate about learning new technologies and am seeking to improve my skills.

experience.title: Frontend Developer @Upwork
points: Work closely with clients to meet project requirment, goals, and desired functionality
Implemented websites, mobile applications, and landing pages from concept through deployment.
Standardized all output with a new, responsive, mobile-first approach and strategy.
Worked as freelancer on real time projects

projects.title: Shelf
projects.detail: A productivity app with suite of applications such as Notes, Todo, Calendar

projects.title: Portfolio-Builder
projects.detail: A portfolio-builder created using ReactJS and NextJs where you can create your own static site by just changing JSON file
